content.name: Holiday Inn Orlando SW Celebration
content.virginView: This welcoming, modern resort is popular with families thanks to its close proximity to Walt Disney World Resort, Universal Orlando® and other popular theme parks. The standard rooms are comfortable, with plenty of space to get ready for a busy day of thrills! If you're not heading out to the rides, have some fun by the pool, enjoy a cocktail from the friendly pool bar, of even hang out in the games room! Dining out in the evening is a doddle, as there are numerous bars and restaurants just a short walk away, meaning you can leave the car behind and share a bottle of wine moments from your 'home away from home'.
atAGlance: Great resort for families in a central location
Complimentary transport to Walt Disney World and Universal Resort

content.name: Watersong Resort
content.virginView: Watersong resort is a gated community within great proximity to the theme parks and outlet malls, so you can choose to spend your days whizzing around the rides or shopping til you drop. Or you can opt to spend the day at home with your private pool, and plenty of fun stuff for all the family to enjoy.
content.hotelDescription: Aviana and Watersong resorts are gated communities within great proximity to the theme parks and outlet malls, so you can choose to spend your days whizzing around the rides or shopping til you drop. Or you can opt to spend the day at home with your private pool, and plenty of fun stuff for all the family to enjoy.
atAGlance: 4 and 5 Bedroom Villas with private screened pool

hotel.name: Red Lion Lake Buena Vista South/East Kissimmee

content.name: Red Lion Lake Buena Vista South/East Kissimmee
content.virginView: A sparkling new addition to the Kissimmee holiday scene, with everything you need for a theme park holiday (plus some rather fun perks thrown in on top). Located just three miles from the gates of Walt Disney World®, this brand new hotel features beautifully appointed rooms. Enjoy complimentary coffee from the café before you set off for the theme parks. When you return, you can soothe those ride-ravaged muscles with a soak in the heated outdoor pool and a float in its ultra-relaxing lazy river, or a stretch in the fitness room’s yoga zone, before tucking into homemade tortillas and fiery guacamole at its Mexican restaurant.
content.hotelDescription: Located just three miles from the gates of Walt Disney World Resort, this brand new hotel features beautifully appointed rooms. Enjoy complimentary coffee from the café before you set off for the theme parks. When you return, you can soothe those ride-ravaged muscles with a soak in the heated outdoor pool and a float in its ultra-relaxing lazy river, before tucking into homemade tortillas and fiery guacamole at its Mexican restaurant.
atAGlance: Complimentary Walt Disney World Resort® shuttle service

content.name: Regal Oaks
content.virginView: Welcome to Regal Oaks, a home-from home gated community offering space, comfort and privacy for you to enjoy your Florida holiday at your own pace. Located in an ideal setting, just a few miles away from the world-famous theme parks, you have no excuse not to get out and explore the fun and thrills that Orlando has to offer. After an adventure filled day, head back to your townhouse to soak up the evening sun by the pool or relax with a cooled drink on your private terrace. You will be spoilt for choice come dinner time, rustle up a storm in your fully-equipped kitchen or head out to one of the local restaurants to dine on some delicious American favourites. Fancy something a little closer to home? The resorts own bar and grill offers freshly made meals any time of the day and some tempting cocktails.
content.hotelDescription: Welcome to Regal Oaks, a home-from home gated community offering space, comfort and privacy for you to enjoy your Florida holiday at your own pace. Located in an ideal setting, just a few miles away from the world-famous theme parks, you have no excuse not to get out and explore the fun and thrills that Orlando has to offer. After an adventure filled day, head back to your luxury townhouse to soak up the evening sun by the pool or relax with a cooled drink on your private terrace. You will be spoilt for choice come dinner time, rustle up a storm in your fully-equipped kitchen or head out to one of the local restaurants to dine on some delicious American favourites. Fancy something a little closer to home? The resorts own bar and grill is sure to impress, with freshly made meals any time of the day and some tempting cocktails.
atAGlance: Only 4-miles away from Walt Disney World Resort
Waived resort fee for Virgin Atlantic Holidays' customers

salesMessages.name: Regal Oaks Waived resort fee

content.name: Buena Vista Suites
content.virginView: An all-suite, modern and classic property in the heart of Orlando, Buena Vista Suites is the perfect spot for a fun-filled few days or weeks at the theme parks. There's some great perks at this hotel that will allow you to save a few pennies to use on souvenirs - complimentary full American breakfast will give you much needed fuel in the morning before a day at the theme parks, which are a short complimentary shuttle ride away, so you can be walking through those park gates in minutes! And when you’re ready for some down time, you’ve got an outdoor pool as well as access to the facilities and dining at next door Caribe Royal Orlando!
content.hotelDescription: An all-suite, modern and classic property in the heart of Orlando, Buena Vista Suites is the perfect spot for a fun-filled few days or weeks at the theme parks. A short drive from both Disney and Universal, you can be walking through those park gates in a quick minute.
atAGlance: Walt Disney World Good Neighbor® Hotel, with complimentary shuttle service to theme parks
Complimentary full American breakfast buffet is served daily
All-one bedroom suite hotel, with resort fee waived for Virgin Holidays guests;

content.name: Wyndham Orlando Celebration Area
content.virginView: For great value, family-friendly accommodation within a stones throw of Walt Disney World, look no further than the recently remodelled Wyndham Orlando Celebration Area – showing that you don’t necessarily need to book an on-site hotel to be in the heart of the action. The hotel includes a complimentary shuttle service to Walt Disney World (the short trip that it is!) as well as Universtal Studios and even the Lake Buena Vista outlets when you want a break from the thrills and spills. Start your day with the fabulous waffles that are on offer at the H Street Grille buffet breakfast, grab a Starbucks from the lobby, and you’ll be all set for wherever you’re heading. There’s no need to leave if you don’t want to though, chill by the pool or let the little ones roam in the indoor play area – you’ll find it hard to tear them away! If it’s the older ones that are looking for some action, book a session at the Topgolf swing suites, you don’t need to be a golf fan to enjoy yourself here, there’s no experience required!
atAGlance: Complimentary scheduled transportation to Walt Disney World Resort®, Universal Studios, and Lake Buena Vista outlets
